name: Wizard's Chores
description:
You are a powerful wizard who serves a kind Patron. The Patron has requested your most powerful potion, so you have to stop sitting around and go do some chores.

You more or less remember what you need, this shouldn't be too complicated.

An incremental game about a wizard trying to make a potion for their land lord.

SPOILERS: If you get stuck there is a walk through here
